QuestData.Title: Cleanse the Mind
QuestData.Description:
If you wish to invite Akunda into your mind, it can't be bogged down by fear or regret.
Meditate at de Shrine of Thunder and confront whatever demons linger in de dark recesses of your mind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meditate at the Shrine of Thunder and confront your inner demons.

Objectives.Objective: Meditate at the Shrine of Thunder
